item.title: Played Swords and Sandals 2?
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

Swords and sandels owns. I played it when it first came out and when swords and sandals 2 came out too. Both are hackable through cheat engine.

I could do with the download and crack for it to.

[quote=“the fu superior, post:10, topic:59958”][quote author=TheBeanie link=topic=86178.msg918050#msg918050 date=1171890501]
Use cheat engine =D

  1. get cheat engine and get it so it locks onto the explorer that s&s is on…
  2. go to hero selection… dont touch the attribute points yet…
  3. on cheat engine click on the search… search for 8, make sure the Hypersearch has a tick next to it…
  4. when its finished searching it brings up loads of stuff…
  5. then go back to hero selection, change all the ability points to 2
  6. click back on cheat engine… and instead of 8 put 16, and click Next Search…
  7. that filters out all the ones that were 8 before and have now gone to 16
  8. add them all the the address thing, and change all the values…

Note, Ea point is 8 points on cheat engine…

so if you wanted 12 points on S&S change it to 32…

if you need any more help add me on msn…

my msn is my email address which you can get from my profile.
[/quote]

can u give the link to ur post . i saw it a while back[/quote]

Its my post. Ask me if you need help.

Read full topic
